title: crypto-hardware.com
author: crypto-hardware.com
content: Hi everybody,I just launched my new website www.crypto-hardware.com. It is a website about hardware wallets and seed backup accessories, focused on education with a knowledge base. It works with affiliate links.I am really interested in your first reactions to the website. The look and feel, the content, etc.. Anything to get me going and start an amazing portal for years to come. The biggest focus will be new crypto enthusiasts.

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: I get the error: "504 Gateway Time-out - The server didn't respond in time." This indicates that there may be an issue with your hosting server.Is your site currently operational?

comments.author: hugeblack

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: OK, I managed to open the site this time, although I still got a 504 Gateway Time-out error once. OP, I think you have bad hosting, because as others have noted, your website is very slow to load. You can also try to optimize some things to speed it up and consider using a caching plugin. Check the results with some benchmark test, like https://gtmetrix.com/ or https://pagespeed.web.dev/.Regarding the content of the site, the first thing I would personally remove is the newsletter pop-up. Newsletters are old school, and almost no one uses them anymore. Instead, use social media to inform your followers about new updates on your site. You can leave the newsletter sign-up somewhere in the footer of the website.All in all, nice job! Just keep improving and adding content.
